謰字的基本解释

謰
lián
〔謰謱（
l巙 ）〕（言语）混乱不清，如“媒女詘兮謰謰”。

謰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lián］
［《集韻》陵延切，平，來。］
(1)见“謰謱”。
(2)见“謰語”。

謰字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　謰； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1178第05
【唐韻】力延切【集韻】陵延切，?音連。【說文】謰謱也。【揚子·方言】謰謱，拏也。南楚曰謰謱。【玉篇】㘓哰也。【字彙】繁絮也。【楚辭·九思】媒女詘兮謰謱。　又人名。孟謰、與謰，見【宋史·宗室表】。　又【集韻】【類篇】?力展切，連上聲。謰謰，語亂也。

謰字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
謰字的起名意思

暂无。

謰
Basic explanation of words
謰
lián
〔謰謱（
l 巙)] (speech) is confused and unclear, such as "the match girl slanderously".
謰
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lián］
["Jiyun" Ling Yanqie, Ping , come. ]
(1) See "謰謱".
(2) See "謰语".
謰
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【You Ji 1】【Words Department】　謰; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1178 No. 05
【Tang Yun】Li Yanqie 【Ji Yun】Ling Yanqie, and the sound is connected. [Said the text] 謰謱 also. 【Yangtze Dialect】Why, take it. Nan Chu said that he was 謰謱. [Jade articles] 㘓哰 also. [Vocabulary] Fanxu also. [Songs of the Chu·Nine Thoughts] The match girl confuses me.　Another name. For Meng Yan, and Yan, see [Song History·Clan List].　[Ji Yun] [Class Chapter]? I tried to cut, and continued to sound. Worry, confusion.
謰
